Interface IInputState

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Base interface for all canvas input states. Implements the State Pattern for clean input handling.

public interface IInputState

Properties

IsModal

Gets whether this state blocks other interactions.

bool IsModal { get; }

bool

Gets the name of this state for debugging.

string Name { get; }

string
